title: fix: simplify polly router config + debug output
author: Itachi-1824

gist.headline: Polly finds her way
gist.blurb: Our repo assistant Polly had a brief disagreement with some model names. We've simplified her map so she's back to helping contributors.
gist.summary: Fixed the Polly AI assistant workflows by updating model routing configurations and enabling better debug logging.
gist.impact: Internal developer tools and issue triage automation are functional again.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee adjusting a confusing signpost or map in a digital garden. Represents fixing the routing logic for the bot.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot Polly adjusting a wooden signpost in a digital garden. Lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'ROUTING'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
